attributes.action: help pensioners pay for residential care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners should not have to sell their homes to pay for Residential care Only if the value is above 3oo,ooo pounds Pensioners have worked all their lives for a good retirement And payed a lot of TAX

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
